inn1.comm: good ball first up, looking for that fuller length and swing, Ganguly picks the full ball late and manages to dig it out to mid-off

edged and dropped! Ntini holds back the length, pushing one across from middle and leg to off, Ganguly's caught in the crease, pushing loosely and the regulation edge is dropped by Kallis at second slip
good length again, angling across him, this time he steers it to de Villiers at point
quicker, off a length on leg stump, catches Ganguly high above the knee roll
and he's off the mark with an inside-edge past leg stump, driving at one seaming away from him cheers around the ground
back of a length outside off stump, Tendulkar gets a good stride in and shoulders arms
slow ball first up, back of a length outside off stump, Ganguly judges the angle and leaves it alone
shorter delivery, good carry off the pitch into Ganguly, who gets up quickly and keeps it down in front of cover
angled across him, fairly wide of off stump, Ganguly's tempted into fishing but misses as the ball swings a huge amount past a diving Boucher and through first slip's legs
full this time on off stump, he turns it to square leg
back of a length outside off stump, Ganguly stands and plays it to de Villiers at point
good length outside off stump, tentative footwork from Ganguly but a gentle push into the gap between cover and point for two
good length outside off stump, hint of movement, Tendulkar again gets a good stride forward and shoulders arms
pitches on a good length outside off stump, comes in, he steps forward again and the ball clips the pad outside the line
back of a length, seams in from outside off and carries well to Boucher as Tendulkar judges it to perfection and leaves with a shuffle
shorter delivery, which he again shoulders arms to
this one nips in off a fuller length and he turns it to square leg
back of a length, comes in as he again tries to turn it away but gets tangled up and the ball drops near his feet
short of a length, moving away, he covers off stump and checks the defensive shot to cover
short of a length outside off stump, he stands up and steers it wide of de Villiers at point, but he dives and stops it
a tad wider now, asking him to reach out and cut, but Ganguly fishes and misses
good shot! Still a lack of footwork but his timing and placement is so sweet, reaching out and driving a wide one through the covers, that he doesnt need to move
back of a length outside leg stump, clips the pad as he tries to nudge it fine
bouncer over leg stump, as Ganguly ducks down, is called wide
a much fuller length this time, Ganguly moves the front foot out and drives straight to mid-off
short delivery outside off stump, in a channel where he cant get forward, and Tendulkar shoulders arms once more
pitches fuller this time, and as it comes into him Tendulkar turns it to van Wyk at square leg
good delivery, lifting sharply off a length and Tendulkar does well to get the bottom hand off the bat and keep it down to point
good length outside off stump, he gets forward quickly and offers a textbook defensive shot to point
quicker delivery, zipping off a short length, not enough room to cut but he does so anyway, on the bounce to point
follows that last delivery up with a slower and fuller delivery which moves in and beats Tendulkar, lunging forward
slow delivery on a full length outside off stump, allowing Ganguly to free the arms and drive back down the ground past mid-off for three
make that 14, as he shoulders arms to another well-pitched delivery outside off stump
good length this time, he uses his feet to get to the pitch, driving straight to the man at cover
back of a length, not allowing him the luxury of driving or cutting, and Tendulkar gets forward and defends, taking the bottom hand off the bat again
finally he's off the mark, shuffling and turning one across the stumps and into the gap behind square leg for four, positive shot to break free
short and wide, he reaches out and cuts into the ground and de Villiers fields
good delivery, pushed across Ganguly's stump and he pokes at it, beaten by the angle
makes room to leg, steps out and carves a short delivery over extra cover but the ball drops near the ropes and slows up
beaten! A really good delivery outside off stump, pitching back of a length and moving away as Tendulkar gets across and fends it off the back foot only to get beaten
identical delivery, bowled from wide of the crease, and this time Tendulkar just manages to withdraw the bat as the ball beats him
good length, coming in with the angle, he gets behind it and defends down the track
banged in short, he pulls across the line with poor timing, and just manages to evade the man at midwicket, was in the air for a while
from over the stumps, beginning with one on a length outside off stump and Ganguly gets across and defends off the back foot

edged and gone! Nel strikes with just his second delivery, getting Ganguly to reach across and drive, with no footwork again, an average good-length delivery into the gloves of Boucher behind the stumps
fullish outside off stump, Gambhir gets forward and drives back down the pitch, Nel fields in animated fashion
good lifter outside off stump, forcing Gambhir to get the head back and drop the bat
pushed across the stumps off a length and Gambhir covers off stump and leaves it be
good length, angling away outside off stump, Gambhir gets a foot in and leaves
back of a length just outside off stump, he gets back and across and turns it through midwicket for a couple
back of a length again, marginally wider, he gets behind it and defends to mid-off, calling a firm ' WAIT' to Gambhir
short of a length this time and he gets up, defending back to Ntini
back of a length just outside off stump, he gets up and defends it again
good length now, bringing Tendulkar forward, who then he turns his wrists to get one towards midwicket
great delivery, pitching on a great length and then coming in to sail over the top of off stump as Gambhir leaves exaggeratedly
lands on a good length, he well gets forward and drives to mid-off, good shot for no runs
good length on off stump, he gets forward and defends, the ball rolling to midwicket
comes in from off to middle and in a flash he rolls the wrists, finding the gap behind square leg for four, great shot
the response is a bouncer down leg stump, forcing Tendulkar down onto his haunches, and Boucher collects well
good length, he gets forward and defends and pinches one in front of square leg after getting an inside-edge
good length delivery angled across him, he gets a good look at it and shoulders arms
good length, drawing him forward and he squeezes it through point and cover for two
beaten! Lands on a great length and then straightens, Tendulkar isnt forward or back and ends up poking at it
back of a length, he gets up on the toes, backs away, and defends to point
shorter this time, coming in from outside off, he shuffles and turns it to square leg
good length, defended to cover
marginally overpitched outside off stump, he leans forward and drives through mid-off

edged and thats a smart catch at second slip! Gambhir, like Ganguly, doesnt move his feet and reaches away from the body to a fullish delivery and this time Kallis holds onto a good catch, moving to his left, and it was travelling at some speed
good length outside off stump, defended to point
back of a length outside off stump, he hops up and defends it down
another short delivery angled into his ribs, he shuffles well and turns it to square leg
very, very high bouncer over the stumps, called wide
good length this time, comes in, Dravid defends and squeezes it past gully for one
slower ball, comes in from outside off stump, catching Tendulkar on the move as he tries to turn the wrists, the ball rolls to cover
a fraction wide outside off stump, and Dravid's feet dont impress much as he wafts and misses
back of a length outside off stump, he reaches out and chops to point
straighter delivery on a length, he rolls the wrists and picks up one to short fine leg
good length outside off stump, he checks the drive to cover
good length outside off stump, he opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
good delivery, straight on a length and Dravid drops the bat to defend, falling forward in the process
back of a length, he gets back and defends to cover
shot! Comes forward and cover-drives a good length delivery, and its only stopped from going to the ropes by an athletic de Villiers, who dives and takes the pace off it
good length on middle and leg, he again falls forward as he defends to leg
back of a length outside off stump, defended to point
good delivery, coming in off a length and Dravid wants one as he taps it with soft hand to point, but his partner says no thanks
on a length, straight delivery, Dravid again defends falling forward
serves up some room outside off stump, not enough to cut perhaps, and Tendulkar gets back and punches through point for four, great footwork and timing
this one's got much more room on it and Tendulkar flashes at it from the crease, getting beaten
straighter delivery on off stump, worked via the wrists to van Wyk at mid-on
marginally overpitched and he comes out and drives, but cant beat the man at cover
shot of the morning! Comes forward and just pushes, with a full face of the bat, a beautiful straight drive for four
ah, the feet are working well today, as indicated by another gentle push through the covers, the ball holding up near the ropes
nips back in off a length and Dravid manages to turn it to square leg, though not in control of the shot
fuller length, moving well down leg stump, he looks to flick and gets beaten, Nel appeals in vain
good length on the stumps, defended
good length on middle and off, rolled with the wrists straight to square leg
bouncer this time, sailing over Tendulkar's left shoulder as he ducks low
shot! Good length outside off stump, he gets to the pitch and pushes past mid-off and cover for four
good length outside off stump, he gets forward, then back, and defends to point
overpitched outside off stump, he defends back to Hall, who gets a hand to it but misfields and the ball rolls to mid-off
good length outside off stump, tapped into the off side
slower delivery, good length again, no chance to free the arms and Dravid defends to cover
drifts to leg stump, Dravid turns it straight to midwicket, struggling to find the gaps
much fuller outside off stump, he leans forward and drives straight to cover this time
ah, wonderful! Tendulkar leans into another good cover drive to an overpitched delivery outside off stump
beaten by one held back a touch outside off stump, Tendulkar playing away from the body
back of a length, he gets the front foot forward and looks to hold back the bat, but the ball clips it and runs into the gap at gully
dragged in short outside off stump, he pulls into the ground and picks up one well behind square leg
back of a length outside off stump, he has so much time to rock  back and push it into the gap, but mid-off times his dive well and saves runs, Nel applauds the effort
too full on the pads, allowing Dravid to pick up with first boundary with a deft little flick around the corner
good length delivery on off stump, Tendulkar shuffles and whips across the line and a good dive by Duminy at square leg saves runs
back of a length well outside off stump, he shoulders arms to it
a touch fuller, a driveable length, but Tendulkar, coming forward, mistimes it to point
good length, he comes forward and defends with an inside-edge to midwicket, runs hard and gets one
quicker on a good length, Dravid hangs his bat out and the ball just manages not to make the outside edge's acquaintance
good length again, he defends to the off side
good length, a good place to begin first-up, Tendulkar comes forward and defends
short and wide, he cuts but mistimes it into the ground just outside off stump
good length, very close to off stump, seaming in and Tendulkar is a good judge of  which ball to leave
back of a length, with width on offer, and Tendulkar cuts hard but de Villiers is sharp in the point region
back of a length outside off stump, just staying low enough to beat Tendulkar, who takes a hand off the bat
back of a length closer to the stumps, he gets back and pushes to cover
drifts down leg stump and Dravid clips past the gap at short fine leg, Philander - hey, he's everywhere - runs across and fields in the deep
good length outside off stump, defended to the off side
slower ball overpitched outside off stump, Dravid gets well forward and drives nicely but de Villiers is excellent in the covers
strays onto leg stump again, Dravid picks up one with a neat flick to van Wyk at square leg
good length, he comes forward and mistimes the shot to mid-off, looked like he wanted to turn it away to leg but didnt judge the length
slower ball overpitched well outside off stump, he leans out and square-drives behind point out to Nel, running across from third man
good length, not much pace on it but he's landing them in good areas, and Tendulkar gets forward and defends back to Philander, who threatens to throw it back
bit of width outside off stump and he square-drives for one
back of a length outside off stump, Dravid plays with soft hands and wants one but there's no way Tendulkar was picking up on that call, as Philander ran forward and picked up the ball
full outside off stump, punched straight to mid-off
just a little wide this time and Dravid eases back and steers it off the back-foot through the gap at gully, a slow response on the ropes allows the second
length delivery on leg stump, Dravid shuffles and turns it out to Langeveldt at backward square leg for one
just too much on leg stump, allowing Dravid to pick up his second boundary with a flick in the vacant fine leg area
tries to compensate and bowls one full and wide, and Dravid runs it down to third man
good delivery! Pitches on a great length outside off stump and straightens, catching Tendulkar by surprise as he defends off the back foot, beaten
fuller this time, just holding up on him as he gets forward and defends uneasily
another good lifter outside off stump, Tendulkar arches his back to let it pass, well bowled and well left
drifts onto leg stump, softly tapped in front of square leg for one
good length, straightening and moving away from Tendulkar, who gets squared up and is lucky the ball didnt go in the air towards point
beaten! Good seam position, pitching on a good length and moving in, beating Tendulkar's booming one-handed drive, well bowled
good length again, a touch slower, and he defends to cover
good length, comes into him and he looks to flick it away but gets an inside-edge onto his thigh
good delivery, landing straight and coming in and he defends it back
bit of room and he chops it to backward point, where theres a minor misfield, Tendulkar wants one but Dravid isnt interested
fullish delivery on middle and leg, Dravid on-drives and Ntini allows the ball to sneak through his legs at mid-on
pitches on leg stump and he turns it around the corner for one, off the pads
halfvolley on off stump, he flicks brilliantly but Kallis at short midwicket stops it very well
slower ball on a length, he again shuffles and this time works it wide of Kallis to raise the 50-run stand
short-pitched delivery sits up and Dravid, initially going for the hook, has to withdraw the shot with two men on the ropes
full and wide, he reaches out and slaps that down to third man for one
good length outside off stump, played with soft hands to point
slower ball, full and straight, Dravid shuffles and works it to mid-on for one
back of a length on off stump, he walks into it looking to manufacture runs to the on-side but adjusts to defend
a bit wider this time, he plays it to point
back of a length on off stump, he backs away and drives loosely to mid-on
good length outside off stump, Dravid plays it nicely, close to the body with soft hands, into the gap at gully for one to third man
back of a length outside leg stump, flicked down to Philander at fine leg
back of a length outside off stump, run fine for one
good length on the stumps, no room to force it away, defended back to Hall
good length on off stump, shuffles and turns it to short midwicket
bouncer down leg stump, Tendulkar gets forward and lets it pass
another short-pitched delivery down leg stump, sits up as Tendulkar tries to leave but then plays with one hand in the air into the gap behind square leg, Hall isnt  impressed
good length on the stumps, driven to Nel at mid-on and Tendulkar calls for the risky single
back of a length on off stump, played with soft hands to point
just a fraction wide and he crunches it to de Villiers at backward point
back of a length on leg stump, worked down to fine leg for one more
a touch fuller on the stumps, driven to midwicket
back of a length on leg stumps, he turns it out to deep backward square leg to move to 49
back of a length on middle and leg, he gets up and taps it in front of short fine leg for one and gets to his 78th ODI half-century
angled down leg stump, Boucher collects and wide called
good length outside off stump, steered to point
comes in off a length and he defends it to leg and calls for one to get the 100 on the board
length delivery on leg stump, easily turned past short fine leg
back of a length on middle and leg, defended to midwicket
good length outside off stump, Dravid plays it with soft hands into the covers
back of a length and he runs it down to Nel at third man
drifts down leg stump, short too, and he laps it to fine leg for four
good length just outside off stump, driven back to Philander
back of a length, he gets back and punches it to backward point
full delivery, driven into the midwicket region and Duminy comes across from mid-on to field
slower ball outside off stump, leans into it and runs it towards point
back of a length on middle and leg, he tucks it around the corner for one
back of a length outside off stump, opens the face and runs it through gully
beaten! Dravid stands his ground and opens the face, trying to run it fine but misses
back of a length again, he hops up and runs it fine again this time
bounces him down leg stump, he gets across the stumps and tries to hook but the ball's too far away, wide is the call
back of a length, he moves across to off and runs it Gibbs at backward point, Tendulkar sets off and has to turn back after he sees Dravid uninterested
similar delivery and this time he softly runs it down through the vacant gully region for one to keep strike next over
just short outside off stump, with extra carry, and he gets back in a flash and punches off the backfoot to the right of point
good length, defended towards point
short and wide, he flashes the bat at it and the ball flies over gully and lands two feet in front of Ntini at third man, who's slow off the blocks
edged for four, as Tendulkar walks out and drives well away from his body, getting a thick outside edge through the vacant slip cordon
back of a length, comes in and he plays it gently to backward point
slower delivery on a length on middle and leg, turned to midwicket
overpitched outside off stump, Tendulkar square-drives through point for one
short and wide, Dravid again flays the bat at it and the ball flies down to third man for four
slower ball, full on middle and leg, he flicks in the air and it falls short of mid-on
a bit of room again and he runs this, along the ground though, to third man
good length on off stump, he walks across and turns it right to midwicket
back of a length, he shuffles across to outside off stump and steers it down to third man for one more
back of a length, he punches off the back foot out to van Wyk at sweeper cover
slower ball, a touch fuller just outside off stump, he comes forward and mistimes the pitch, defends
short on the stumps and he pulls along the ground out to deep backward square leg
good length outside off stump, he comes onto the front foot and drives to cover
a touch slower, off a length and he pushes to mid-off
back of a length, he gets back and pushes to cover again to end a good over from Nel
good slower ball on a full length, Dravid is too late on the shot and ends up scooping it to cover, but safely in front of the fielders
back of a length on leg stump, turned to midwicket for one
good length delivery outside off stump, he plays it late and picks up one to third man
slower ball on a length, coming into off stump, he rolls the wrists and drives to mid-on
back of a length down leg stump, he shuffles and turns it to fine leg
slower ball on a driveable length, he plays it back to Ntini, who fields well in his follow-through
good length on the stumps, he swipes across the line to midwicket
short of a length, extra bounce, he drives to the off side with a bottom-edge
tight stuff continues from Philander, on a length and its defended back
short and wide, he cuts past point out to van Wyk on the ropes
good length, he lunges forward and tries to drive but mistimes it
a bit more room, he rocks back and cuts hard past backward point out to the fielder running around from third man
more room on offer and he cuts down past that same gully gap to get to his 79th ODI fifty, one more than Tendulkar
time to get going, he says, coming down the track and drilling one through the covers for four
good length on the stumps, driven to midwicket, mistimed shot
good length outside off stump, he shuffles across and almost gets squared up but adjusts to open the face and run it to third man
good length delivery comes in, Dravid again just runs it down to third man
bounced in on the stumps, he backs away, arching the back and trying to uppercut but the ball beats him and Boucher takes
gets into position and pulls a long-hop just over midwicket, time to get the groove on!
well bowled, yorker on off stump, flicked into midwicket for one
short and wide, he rocks back and places the cut in the gap in front of point
slower ball, almost a yorker, nudged to mid-on
overpitched and he drives past mid-off for one, couldve run two there
nice shot! Backs away, exposes the stumps, and drives a low full toss through the covers
a bit of room, he makes room and cuts it out to Nel at third man
good hit, hammering a half-volley in the air down to long-off
sits up off a short length, he gets up on the toes and keeps it down to short third man
short delivery on top of leg stump, Tendulkar walks across the stumps and tries to pull but misses
now he backs away to leg and tries to hammer it through the off side but the ball moves in and he's beaten on the cut, good bounce there
half-volley outside off stump, he steps aside and drives but straight to mid-off, if he hadnt moved outside his crease he could have taken toll of that delivery
width on offer, he rocks back, waits so late and then brings the bat down like a rapier and gets four to third man, shot!
slower delivery on a length, moves in and he does well to play it softly and pick up a single to third man, intelligent batting now from Dravid
good length on off stump, he comes forward and closes the face to get one through square leg
he oversteps, full toss on leg stump, Dravid cant put the ball away, ends up pushing into the ground
good delivery, slower on a length and Tendulkar gets forward to push it into the covers from doesnt pick the length
slow half-volley, he uses the feet and drives straight to de Villiers at cover
short delivery, he backs away to leg and uppercuts over gully and third man cant stop it
on the stumps, he rolls the wrists and flicks to short fine leg
pitches on leg stump, he flicks into deep midwicket where van Wyk does the fielding
again Dravid plays his favoured dab down to third man, the shot thats got him the bulk of his runs today
slower on middle and leg, he gets across and works it to Duminy at midwicket, show swoops in and fires in a throw that wouldve sent Tendulkar back inside, but it just missed
yes, you guessed it, Dravid opens the face and runs it to third man
he checks his drive and it balloons up in the air towards mid-off but the fielder is deep so he survives
good length outside off stump, comes out and drives to extra cover
back of a length on middle and leg, he adjusts and plays it into the gap at midwicket and mid-on and scampers one
slower ball outside leg stump, he backs away and swipes across the line and makes a mess of it, missing
good ball, yorker outside leg stump, he gets bat on it and runs it down to....yes, third man, as you all can guess...he loves that region
comes out of the crease, using the feet and driving inside-out over cover and point for one
full delivery outside leg stump, he backs away and the ball clips his back boot and trickles to square leg
just stands there and swipes at a back of a length delivery over off stump....and misses, a tired shot
again his feet dont move at all as he wafts at one wider of the stumps and fails to connect
third ball in a row! Dravid cant touch a ball, standing rooted and fishing at one, urgently, but failing to connect...thats three dot balls
good ball, yorker on middle and leg which he manages to scoop back to Ntini's right
back of a length outside off stump, he goes back to what he does best, opening the face and steering it to third man for one
edged and it falls short of Boucher, as Tendulkar comes down and drives, and the ball runs away for one
good length on the stumps, he drives down the ground for two
yorker does the trick! Dravid stands rooted, in that same odd groove that engulfed him all of last over, and flashes the bat at it, losing one hand off it, and leg stump goes for a walk, Nel loves it
from around the stumps, full on middle and leg, flicked out to deep midwicket
good length delivery, Tendulkar greets it with a push into the covers and immediately calls for one
good length on middle and leg, he turns it away through square and calls for two, picking the sluggish van Wyk in the deep, good judgement
bouncer over leg stump, he ducks down and looks back at the unresponsive umpire
back of a length outside off stump, he casually runs that down to third man, with a century in sight
just short outside off stump, he cuts hard and late in the gap at gully, Philander runs across from third man, dives, pulls it back in, great effort
slower ball on a length outside off stump, he shuffles across and just taps that in front of point and takes the single
backs away, the ball is slow and full on off stump and he just gets the bat on it, driving to the bowler
slow delivery again, on a good length, he doesnt pick it and ends up playing to point
full and wide, square-driven out to sweeper cover
awesome! Just stands his ground and tees-off with a powerful, clean strike over the bowler's head for four, bisecting long-off and long-on
this time he fails to pick the slower one, trying to drive a short delivery and it pops up dangerously but lands just between mid-on and midwicket
banged in down the leg stump, wide called

would you believe?? Tendulkar gets run out on 99! The ball was back of a length, he dabs if off the back foot through cover-point, van Wyk runs in from sweeper cover, collects it and fires in a great throw to Boucher, and Tendulkar, on 99, turns and runs for a mad second and is caught just short of his crease
fullish ball outside off stump, driven to cover
back of a length on leg stump, he pushes it back to the bowler, who comes across and fields, diving and fumbling
back of a length outside off stump, he plays it late and soft to pick up one through point
full outside off stump, Yuvraj stands rooted and swings across the line, finding Kallis at mid-on, who takes a simple catch
off the mark immediately, shuffling and tapping a good length delivery on middle and leg and responding well to Karthik's call
good length outside off stump, he uses the feet and drives to cover
comes into him off a length, Karthik makes room and dabs it to backward point and sprints through
a touch fuller, Sharma plants the front foot well forward and the ball hits pad first, moving in, but the umpire reckons it was outside the line
similar delivery, but this time Sharma gets the foot forward and turns it to midwicket
fullish length outside off stump, Karthik drives and gets a thick outside-edge that flies through the vacant slip region
makes room to leg stump and cuts past backward point for a couple out to third man
comes onto the front foot, then sees the length of the ball and waits on the shot, opening the face at the last second and running it to third man
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and pushes into the covers for a single
lovely shot! Karthik plants the front leg out and flicks a slower ball, with the movement, for maximum over deep midwicket, a superb pick-up shot
cheeky! This time he gets down one on knee, walks across, exposing the stumps, and scoops the ball over short fine leg for four...excellent calculation and execution by Karthik
backs away, Hall follows him and the result is an inside-edge to short fine leg
comes onto the front foot and drives heartily, but misses all ends up
cleaned up! Karthik makes room and looks to drill this through the off side, but the balls not on for that shot, too full, and it hits the stumps
good length, pitching on leg and moving away, Chawla taps it in front of point and runs the single
backs away, sees the ball is full outside off stump and reaches out, driving out to Nel coming across from third man
gets a step out, then waits as the ball is shorter than expected, and runs it wide of Boucher
makes room, eyeing extra cover, but ends up splicing it over backward point for two
looking to clear midwicket, Sharma swings across the line, the bat closes in his hands and he fails to make contact, the ball knocking back leg stump
good length outside off stump, Powar chops it to point and jogs one
slow and full on leg stump, the legcutter, which Chawla flicks into midwicket for one
makes room and swings at it, but connects with air

all over! Powar stands there and chips it into the hands of de Villiers moving around from cover, almost colliding with Philander, coming in from mid-off, smiles between the two and Kallis gets his second with the final ball

inn2.comm: good length on off stump, de Villiers shuffles and defends it back
angled across the stumps, with two slips waiting, and de Villiers covers off and lets it be
good delivery, pushed across from middle to off, de Villiers gets a stride in and shoulders arms
overpitched, just, and de Villiers drives though the covers, Yuvraj gives chase and brings it in as it slows up near the boundary
fuller delivery, comes in a touch and de Villiers is saved by an inside-edge onto the front pad
back of a length outside leg stump, de Villiers stands on one leg and tries to pull but the ball pops up into the offside, safely
a wide first up, full and swinging outside off stump as van Wyk chases it
good length, moving away outside off stump as van Wyk leaves it be
a touch fuller, but still moving away, and he leaves it alone with a safe stride in
back of a length, well wide of off stump, van Wyk was about to crash it away but leaves
short and wide, van Wyk cuts very well but cant  beat Sharma at cover
again the ball's there to be drilled to the point fence but van Wyk this time finds Yuvraj at point
good length, pitching and straightening, he comes forward and defends to point
another poor delivery, full and wide, but van Wyk finds Yuvraj at point again
slower delivery, short of a length in that channel outside off stump, moves away as de Villiers decides to hold back the bat
a touch fuller, de Villiers comes forward in defense
good length, moving away from off stump, he comes forward and pushes gently for one to the off side
ohhh! This one pitches outside off stump, just, and comes in perilously close to off as van Wyk opts to leave it
fractionally shorter this time, too close to cut, but he does so anyways and finds cover
good delivery, pitching on a good length and shaping away from van Wyk, who's squared up off the back foot, playing and missing
good length, pitching on leg and moving in, ball darts into him and he gets an inside-edge into the midriff, a good call from the non-striker gets one
off a good length, he stands rooted and cuts, very close to the body, and gets an inside-edge close to off stump
better-looking shot, standing and driving into the gap at cover and Dravid gives chase
good length, delivered closer to the stumps and getting it to move past the stumps as de Villiers hangs the bat behind his head and leaves
pitches outside off and moves away, he reaches out and drives but chops into the ground
back of a length, pitching on about middle and leg, he gets behind to counter any movement and defends back to RP with a full face of the bat and good balance
fullish on off stump, flicked through the gap at midwicket and Dravid foes the fielding
good length, nipping in from outside off stump, he gets his head down and defends in front of point
fuller delivery, looking for movement, but he counters it and drives to mid-off for a risky single, but well done in the end as it was Powar there
back of a length this time, he plays it with an open face towards point and calls for it
bowls it a bit too short and van Wyk crashes it through cover and point for the first four of the innings
pitches well outside leg stump and he scampers a leg-bye
good length just outside off stump, comes forward and drives to mid-off
back of a length on leg stump, just worked off the hips to square leg and de Villiers calls for one immediately
shot! Short outside off stump and he thumps it with power through the covers, that ball fairly raced away before anyone could move
too full this time down leg stump, trying to make up for that last short ball
good length, he gets forward and defends with soft hands, calling for the one even as the ball rolls into the covers
shorter this time, van Wyk defends to cover off the back foot
good length on the stumps, he gets across to off and defends it back to RP
good length outside off stump, pushed to point off the front foot
good length, he gets forward and defends to cover
back of a length on the stumps, he shuffles and works it to midwicket, de Villiers calls for the single and gets it
a touch slower, pushed across the stumps and straightening, he gets a look in and shoulders arms
good length just outside off stump, he gets forward and pushes to cover where Sharma is quick to move and cut off the single
back of a length this time and he drops the hands on it, to point
straight delivery, he gets behind it and drives to a diving midwicket
way down leg stump, he stands and tries to flick
good length on the stumps, defended
good length outside off stump, driven off the front foot to Sharma at cover
a bit shorter this time, he gets back and punches to cover again
back of a length, he gets up and defends confidently
back of a length, pitching on middle and off, he gets in line and defends to midwicket
short on the stumps and van Wyk picks the length early, pulling in front of square
straighter delivery on middle and leg, turned to square leg
good length on the stumps, van Wyk shuffles dangerously to off and turns it to midwicket
good length, he stands and drives, getting an inside-edge to square leg
nice stuff, getting right on top of a short delivery and bringing the wrists down well, placed in the gap at point and the outfield carries it away
better delivery, straight on the stumps and he defends down the ground
good length, a loosener outside off stump, no pace and its left alone
good length just outside off stump, he comes onto the front foot and defends
skips down the track, despite short cover waiting, and drives on the up for four
too short however, and he frees the arms, cutting up and over point and Zaheer from third man cant get there in time
good length outside off stump, de Villiers lets it pass
good length again, on a channel that doesnt quite allow for cutting, and de Villiers is content to leave it alone, having already picked up two fours in the over
good length on the stumps, pitching and straightening, and van Wyk defends
a touch fuller and he gets forward, driving to Ganguly at extra cover
back of a length right on the stumps, van Wyk gets behind it and defends
good length on middle and off, turned to midwicket
a touch fuller outside off stump, driven straight to mid-off
good ball, straightening after pitching and he defends it back
on a driveable length outside off stump, he gets forward and drives to mid-on
too full on off stump, de Villiers drives and streakily gets the ball into the square leg area
straighter delivery on leg stump, nicely flicked past square leg
good length on off stump, getting van Wyk forward in defense
good length, comes in and he cuts to point
a bit too wide and he gets over it, cutting backward of point for four
edged and dropped! he comes out, looking to go over extra cover, but he gets a thick edge that Tendulkar, at a wide slip, couldnt hold on to, leaping up and getting fingers to it
straighter delivery, looks to flick but gets a leg bye
good shot, taking a full delivery on leg stump and flicking behind square
drifts down leg stump, he flicks in the air backward of square and it bounces down to Zaheer at fine leg

edged and taken this time! RP bowls a pretty ordinary delivery, short and moving away but de Villiers stands his ground and chases it, getting a thick edge that Karthik, diving full stretch to his right, holds on to in front of Tendulkar
another short of a length delivery, Kallis gets up on the toes and cuts it down through gully to get off the mark first ball
back of a length, Kallis punches to Yuvraj at point
just short of a good length, allowing Kallis the room to get forward and drive hard, but too Sharma in the covers
a touch too full, but Kallis' drive goes to the man in the covers once more
short of a length, and he chops it down to third man for a single
width offered and he cuts out to deep point for one
just a little too wide again, allowing Kallis the room to steer it to third man again
good length, he comes out and drives to cover
straight delivery, he drives back down the ground where RP gets his hand out to it as he dives and saves runs
shuffles, then dances out of the box and drives on the up to Yuvraj at point
too full on the stumps, and he flicks powerfully over mid-on for four, good shot
shuffles in the crease again, stepping aside and hooking a short ball along the  ground to deep fine leg
bouncer this time, over off stump, which he lets pass for a wide
this ball is short on middle and leg and he pulls nicely through midwicket for four
good length outside off stump, perhaps a touch wide, van Wyk cuts into the covers
good length on the stumps, Kallis looks to close the face but ends up defending into the covers, then immediately calling for one
too short on off stump, staying low but van Wyk pulls through the vacant square leg area and collects four
back of a length, he cuts it to point this time
good length, he gets onto the front foot, looking to drive, but mistimes it to cover with too much bottom hand on it
fractionally wide this time, and he doesnt let it go, cutting out to deep point
good length outside off stump, he leans forward and drives to Powar at mid-off
shuffles around, tucking a good length delivery on off stump to mid-on for one
good length on off stump, he comes forward and whips it past mid-on, good shot
good length outside off stump, steered off the front foot to point
good length again, but this time he comes forward and places a great square-drive, late, through the gap
comes across to one on middle and leg and whips it past square leg
flat on the stumps, turned to square leg, where substitute Robin Uthappa fires in a bad throw that goes for three
tossed up, he comes forward and plays out in front of his pad to cover
drifter this time, pitching just outside leg stump on a short length and skidding on hit him on the thigh
tossed up on leg, flicked for one
quicker one on middle and leg, defended to square leg
short ball on the stump, pulled hard but the man at midwicket fields it
tossed up on off stump, driven back to Powar
tossed up, it dips on Kallis, who comes down the track and drives back
too wide outside off stump and he steers it down to third man for two
tossed up outside off stump, Kallis uses the feet then goes back as the ball spins into him, played to midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, spins in as Kallis gets a big stride forward and beats him
tossed up again, Kallis gets out and sweeps in front of the pad but mistimes it
tossed up, spins away and van Wyk cuts well, but Yuvraj dives at point
looped up on middle and off, spins in and its turned to square leg
flatter down leg stump, he goes for the sweep and misses, wide not called
too short and flat and he cuts it well through the covers for four in the final over of Powerplays
got 'em! Chawla tosses it up, getting it to dip and spin, and van Wyk is beaten by the turn as he looks to just turn it fine, the leading edge lobs up to cover where Sharma holds an easy catch
wrong 'un spins in from leg stump, Gibbs backs away and takes it on the inner thigh
tossed up, it dips on Kallis, who gets forward and flicks to midwicket
slower one, tossed up outside off stump, he gets across and turns it to square leg
tossed up, he comes a long way forward and defends
flatter this time outside off stump, he gets down and sweeps with the spin all along the ground through square leg for four
tossed up, teasing loop and drop, but Gibbs gets forward and defends
flatter delivery outside off stump, he gets across and pulls, getting an inside-edge through fine leg

bowled 'em neck and crop! Chawla you beauty! Tosses up a leg break this time, which pitches on the stumps and doesnt spin, but sneaks through the big gap between bad and pad to clip off stump,Gibbs was clueless
flatter one this on leg stump,flicked through midwicket and he's off the mark
short and wide, cut to point
tossed up, driven to midwicket
tossed up, driven to mid-off
bad ball, short and wide and Duminy puts it away with a firm cut past point
tossed up outside off stump, spins in but Kallis gets a good stride forward, paddling it down to fine leg where Ganguly fields
flatter on off stump, shuffles across and flicks to square leg
tossed up, beaten and an inside-edge onto the pads
tossed up outside leg stump, padded away
tossed up on leg stump, defended
flatter one outside off stump, driven to cover
tossed up on the stumps, comes forward and drives back
tossed up on leg stump, turned to short fine leg
bit too short and spinning away, Kallis rocks back and cuts hard out to deep cover
tossed up on middle and leg, Duminy shimmies down the track and picks it up off the pads, lofting over mid-on

tossed up, it hurries onto him as he plants the leg forward and turns with the spin, the ball takes bat then pad and balloons up behind the stumps, where Karthik dives full stretch towards short fine leg but the ball beats him
flat on leg stump, turned to short fine leg
flat outside off stump, Kallis gets forward and flicks for one
tossed up outside leg stump, he gets onto one knee and sweeps to fine leg
short and flat on leg stump, he gets down and sweeps hard out to deep backward square leg
well flighted, and a tentative Duminy prods forward in defense
and he goes sweeping! Powar bravely tosses it up on leg stump again, and Duminy cant resist sweeping with the spin, failing to keep it low and Tendulkar gobbles it up at deep midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, comes across and turns it fine
full toss on the stumps, he gets forward and flicks it away through the gap at square leg for four to get off the mark
quicker one, flat outside off stump and he cuts to point
tossed up outside off stump, he gets forward and drives to cover
drifter on leg stump, Kallis shuffles back and flicks to square leg
too flat on leg stump, and Kallis works it out past square leg
tossed up, Boucher gets across and flicks from outside off stump, getting a couple out to deep midwicket
tossed up on the stumps, dips again and Kallis coolly shuffles, nudging it fine for one
tossed up, Boucher again takes it from outside off stump and flicks to midwicket
tossed up on off stump, he plays it late and turns it into midwicket
tossed up on a length, Kallis waits for it to spin into him and drives off the back foot into the gap at cover
tossed up, he whips it across the line out to deep midwicket
floated up, Boucher gets out and takes it from outside off for one more to leg
looped up, ends up a low full toss which he flicks to mid-on
good loop on that one, but he gets behind it and defends it back, well read
flatter delivery, spinning away and he pushes off the back foot to cover
well flighted, he gets a good stride in and defends to cover
tossed up, he comes out and drives to cover this time
too short and wide, Boucher frees the arms and cuts out to deep cover
tossed up, he takes it on the full and flicks from outside off to midwicket
good one, tossed up and staying straight, beating Kallis' forward prod
tossed up on off stump,Kallis shuffles and taps it to leg
tossed up, it dips but Boucher just flicks it to mid-on
a touch flatter but he still continues to milk singles to leg
flatter trajectory, spins in but Boucher gets back and across to work it to square leg
short and flat, he cuts out to deep point
bad ball, flat down leg stump, played off the pads to short fine leg
flat outside off stump, Kallis comes onto the front foot and drives through cover
tossed up outside off stump, Boucher shuffles across and defends, missing the line of the ball
short and flat, he goes back and drives to cover
short and wide, easy as they come, drives out to deep cover
moves around the stumps, tosses it up, Kallis plays across the line and the ball pops up into his helmet, forearm, etc ect
tossed up again, flicked into midwicket where Yuvraj misfields
tossed up outside off stump, and its paddled to short fine leg
tossed up, he tries to turn it but the ball gets tangled up
flatter delivery, worked to midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, flicked into the gap at midwicket and Yuvraj gives chase
tossed up, width offered and he cuts out to deep cover
flatter one on leg stump, he adjusts and works it to midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, Boucher comes forward and defends
drifted down leg stump, he flicks around the corner to short fine leg
flat down leg stump, no turn at all, and he plays it past short fine leg this time
short outside off stump,Kallis cuts out to the man in the deep again
tossed up very wide, he reaches out and flicks
tossed up the stumps, turned to square leg
flat on off stump, comes across and takes it from outside off stump to leg
tossed up, holding it in the air for a second, it dips on him and he taps it back
tossed up, Kallis flicks from outside off stump to Chawla at short fine leg
pushed across the stumps, Kallis lunges forward, opens the face of the bat and the ball spins past it
flatter one, Boucher shuffles across and looks to work it fine but the ball slips into his left pad
flat again, worked to midwicket for one
tossed up, driven to RP Singh at point
tossed up again, he gets the leg forward and drives out to deep cover
tossed up, driven back down the ground and Yuvraj lets it through during his follow-through, poor fielding
tossed up, he gets forward and drives to Sharma at cover, too much bottom hand on that shot
good length on leg stump, worked through square leg and some excellent running gets him two
shuffles in his crease, eager to work it to leg and he does get one to deep backward square leg

and the bowling change works, as Zaheer lands one short of a length marginally outside leg stump, the ball catches Boucher hopping back in the crease, but to the naked eye it seemed that ball was carrying over the stumps
good length, looking for swing, Hall gets forward and tucks that towards mid-on
back of a length, angling across the stumps, he gets a stride in and shoulders arms comfortably
shuffles across to off stump before the ball is bowled, then works one off the hips down to fine leg for a well-run triple that raises his 50, well played
tossed up, he looks to play across the line but the ball beats him, and Karthik
tossed up, pushed back to Chawla
flatter delivery, fuller too, and its squeezed to point
tossed up, he steps well across the stumps and drives, misses and the ball thuds into the front pad
tossed up, driven to cover
flat outside off stump, cut out to cover
good length, pushed back to the bowler
full on leg stump, and thats rightfully clipped through midwicket for four
back of a length outside off stump, beating Hall's leaden-footed waft
back of a length again, this time he connects well going forward on the defensive
shot! Overpitched and he drills that through mid-off and covers for four
short outside off stump, pulled through midwicket out to the man on the ropes
tossed up outside off stump, he plants the front leg out and drives into the covers
tossed up outside off stump, he too drives out to sweeper cover
looped up, he uses the feet and drives into the covers for another single
tossed up, he gets forward and drives loosely to mid-on
flatter delivery, full, he comes out and defends to cover
full on off stump, he flicks across the line to midwicket
tossed up, he gets forward and defends
tossed up, lots of air, Kallis uses the feet and drives out to long-on
flat on leg stump, worked out to deep backward square leg for one
flat on the stumps, swept to Chawla at short fine leg
tossed up again, swept fine again
flat and short, spins in and he works it to midwicket
flighted ball outside off, Hall tries to drive but only manages an inside edge onto his pads
over-pitching again, Hall gets to it and drives through the covers
flatter this time, better length, Kallis caught in two minds and gets an inside edge to the leg side for a single

got 'em! That's a crucial breakthrough for India. Full again and Hall drives straight to short cover. Dravid had positioned himself there just before that, going from first slip, and it goes straight to him. He juggles but takes in on the second try. Hall departs and India are cock-a-hoop. Piyush strikes another big blow. And is he loving it!
flatter ball, drifting down leg, tries the wrong one, wide called but that was a good attempt to fool him around his legs
full again, googly this time, Philander pushes hard and the inside edge goes to short midwicket
flatter, googly again, clipped away to the leg side for a single
full, tossed up outside off and Philander turns it away to midwicket for a single. Milks it away for an easy single
straighter one, foxed him that time, Kallis confused and gets a thick outside edge to the off side
turned straight to short midwicket
round the wicket, angling from outside leg, clipped to short fine for a single
flatter, outside off, turned to short midwicket and runs a quick single, Yuvraj picks it up and tries the direct hit but can't nail it. That would have been close
straight again, turned away for a single, good work by Gambhir at deep square
tossed up outside off, Kallis pushes back to the bowler
too short and outside off, Kallis backs away and clatters it behind square for a four. Latched on to the length and put it away. Sign of an outstanding player
pushed to the leg side and completes a quick single
faster one, skids on to the batsman, glided to third man but can't take the quick single
full on middle and leg, driven crisply to the leg side for a single
flighted outside off but Kallis shuffles across and turns it to the leg side for a single
tossed up, worked to mid-on
flat on leg stump, he shuffles across and flicks to midwicket
tossed up, he uses the feet and drives inside-out to cover
flat down leg stump, he shuffles and gets rapped on the leg, they appeal but that was going down
tossed up, good use of the feet gets him one down to long-off
flat on the stumps, worked across the line to midwicket for one more
tossed up outside off stump, steered to point
flat and wide, cut to deep point
flat outside off stump, comes across and defends to leg
tossed up, he flicks from outside off stump to midwicket
flat on the stumps, flicked out to deep backward square leg
wide outside off stump, cut to point
tossed up on leg stump, he defends and gets a leading-edge along the ground to cover
flat delivery on the stumps, he drives off the back foot to RP Singh at mid-on
tossed up, Kallis comes forward and defends to cover
flat outside leg stump, swept hard but into the ground and Karthik fields
wider of leg stump, he sweeps again, misses, so does Karthik and Chawla has to give chase from short fine leg
tossed up, uses the feet and drives out to long-off where Zaheer does the fielding
flat outside off stump, waits for it and dabs it to point for a quick single
good length on the stumps, he moves across the crease and flicks out to deep midwicket
back of a length outside off stump, comes forward and squeezes it through point
back of a length, he defends with an inside-edge to square leg
fuller length on off stump, well played to square leg for one to get Kallis back on
good shot, full delivery, Kallis crunching a cover drive into the gap for one
short and moving away, Philander flays and misses but a wide is called
good length on the stumps, played back to RP
overpitched, wide of off stump, he square-drives and Yuvraj does well at backward point
short delivery outside off stump, he walks into the shot and pulls all along the ground behind square leg for four
moves around the wicket, lands it on a length and Kallis defends to point
short of a length on middle and off, he shuffles and cant work it away
good length this time, he pushes to mid-on and sprints through for one, taking on young Sharma's arm
good length delivery, drops the head and defends it down
tossed up on the stumps, Kallis sweeps hard through square leg and Zaheer does well to pick and throw it back in, one-handed, one move...thats a rarity!
tossed up, pushed into the covers
close! Tossed up, Kallis stands and defends, very loosely, the ball ballooning up in the air and landing short of a diving cover
flat on leg stump, swept out past a lazy Ganguly for two
tossed up on a length, he waits for it and dabs it fine
flatter one from over the stumps now, Kallis looks to once more work it fine but gets squared up, the ball rolling to the off side
good, swinging yorker, he drives and squeezes bat onto it, then onto his toes, the ball rolls to the off side and Philander hobbles down the track after Kallis calls
rubbish delivery, short down leg stump, Kallis pulls and gets some bat on it, the ball rolls down past a vacant short fine leg area for four
full toss, swinging, Kallis is surprised and ends up defending it back to Zaheer
slower ball, he looks to drive off one knee and mistimes the shot back to Zaheer
short and wide, useless ball, he cuts hard but to Yuvraj at point
good length outside off stump, Kallis comes onto the front foot and square-drives to point again
tossed up, he frees the arms and cuts into the covers
tossed up on leg stump, he sweeps to short fine leg
all over! Philander seals the deal in style, coming out of his crease and clobbering a nicely tossed up delivery down to long-off
